Tim Cook, entrepreneur of Chamisa and Cook's Computer Service, seems to want to change the world - one customer at a time. Chamisa is innovative, very user friendly, and cost effective. I became familiar with Tim Cook when my husband was working in his area and used his services. We have long sought reliable, knowledgeable, honest work for our computers, tech et al. There is no service available with the above qualifications (and more) where we live.We drive an hour plus to receive the high quality service we receive from Tim Cook. I use Tim for my family in Florida and I refer anyone who asks in Cashiers North Carolina and vicinity to Tim Cook. I expect the same quality of service that I would render in my own work/service and thus far have not found anything equivalent to the quality service that Tim provides.

summary: Founder Institute Co Director,  3 time entrepreneur, 1 mildly successful, one failure and now Chamisa. Building a computer repair software to help both IT professionals and consumers save hours of time repairing malware infected computers by automating the process. www.pctechmate.com is the first of several products to leave our stables.I am a small business owner,  a civic leader and a board member of the Habitat for Humanity. Connecting the dots, making order out of chaos, and finding a way forward to succeed (direct from James Colgan)Short version: Serial startup guy (3 so far). Live in the greatest place in the world!. Long Version: Was a yacht captain in the Eastern Caribbean for several years and moved back stateside to be closer to my son. There weren't very many yachts to drive up here so I opened a computer repair store. During the first 18 months we created a checklist of what we would do to repair our customers' virus ridden computers. We then built a software that would automate that process. It really worked, and www.pctechmate.com was born. We are modernizing computer repair.
name: Tim Cook
title: CEO, PcTechmate
